item.title: Publications
item.description:
1. Naidu, Aditya. A Primer on Microeconomics. Unpublished, 2013. PDF
  2. Traffic anomaly detection for IoT devices in field area network. U.S. Patent 11032302 Granted June 8, 2021
  3. System and method for network traffic profiling and visualization. U.S. Patent 10230599 Granted March 12, 2019
  4. System and method for real-time reporting of anomalous internet protocol attacks U.S. Patent 9130982 Granted September 8, 2015
  5. Method, apparatus and program for detecting spoofed network traffic U.S. Patent 8925079 Granted December 30, 2014
  6. Redundancy detection and resolution and partial order dependency quantification in access control lists U.S. Patent 8719913 Granted May 6, 2014
  7. Systems and methods for single session management in load balanced application server clusters. U.S. Patent 7962635 Granted June 14, 2011

item.title: Custom Domain for Static Website on Github Pages
item.description:
Introduction Link to heading

A short article on how to use a custom domain for a website on github.io

Create a repo for your static website on Github Link to heading

On github.com, create a repo <githubusername>.github.io.

Pull this repo to your local machine and add a index.html file with some test content. And push it back to github.com. You can do this on the github webpage itself. So you don’t really need git installed locally.
